author: John Bowden
title: Nurses to protest at White House Tuesday
description: A national nurses' union announced Monday that members of their organization would protest at the White House on Tuesday to demand funding for mass production of personal protective equipment (PPE) in the next stimulus pa...
content:
A national nurses' union announced Monday that members of their organization would protest at the White House on Tuesday to demand funding for mass production of personal protective equipment (PPE) in the next stimulus package.
